title: Himalayas, Nepal/India/Tibet/China
description: The Himalayas are the highest mountain range in the world, home to Everest, and known for its breathtaking views, rugged terrain, and spiritual significance.

title: Great Barrier Reef, Australia
description: The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system, offering vibrant marine life, crystal-clear waters, and stunning underwater views.

title: Amazon Rainforest, South America
description: The Amazon Rainforest is the largest tropical rainforest in the world, teeming with diverse wildlife and playing a key role in the Earth's climate.

title: Swiss Alps, Switzerland
description: The Swiss Alps are famous for their picturesque landscapes, with snow-capped peaks, beautiful valleys, and world-renowned skiing resorts.

title: Maldives, Indian Ocean
description: The Maldives is an island nation known for its crystal-clear turquoise waters, pristine beaches, and stunning coral reefs, perfect for diving and relaxation.

title: Amazon River, South America
description: The Amazon River is the second-longest river in the world, flowing through the dense Amazon Rainforest, home to an abundance of plant and animal species.

title: Costa Rica Rainforests, Costa Rica
description: Costa Rica's rainforests are rich in biodiversity, with lush jungles, exotic wildlife, and eco-tourism opportunities like hiking, zip-lining, and wildlife watching.

title: Banff National Park, Canada
description: Banff National Park, located in the Canadian Rockies, offers dramatic mountain landscapes, crystal-clear lakes, and diverse wildlife, perfect for hiking and outdoor adventures.
